title: Suns Advance, Kyrie's Injury, Potential Off-Season Trades | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Suns Advance, Kyrie's Injury, Potential Off-Season Trades | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
A big week of WHAT'S BURNIN as the boys talk Kyrie Irving's series changing injury, the suns sweep of the Nuggets to advance to the WCF, and they examine potential off-season trades of major point guards.
